Lakshya Sen withdrew from the Hong Kong Open Super 500 two hours before his match and gave a walkover to his first-round opponent Su Li Yang of Chinese Taipei on Wednesday.

articles.title: Why Bellingham is England's future as Maguire's woes worsen - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Jude Bellingham continued his excellent run of form in England's win over Scotland while questions around Harry Maguire's future are piling up.
articles.content: GLASGOW -- It says everything about Jude Bellingham's performance here that the same Scotland fans who spent the entire evening making Hampden Park as hostile as possible ended up applauding the Engl… [+6647 chars]

articles.title: “End of an Era”: Days After Chris Bumstead Scared His Fans, an Underlying Condition Convinces IFBB Coach of His Impending Retirement - EssentiallySports - EssentiallySports
articles.description: The IFBB pro coach puts his perspective on Chris Bumstead retiring from the bodybuilding stage soon due to a health condition.
articles.content: Bodybuilding requires immense dedication to develop a title-winning physique. Despite rigorous gym training and a strict diet followed by many, only a few names make it to the top. But the painstakin… [+3509 chars]
